title: Ticket #2171: Test suite failing on Solaris 10
description:
Tests have been failing on Solaris 10 for about a week now. I was hoping that the problem was that the Solaris 10 VM was running on a VMWare 1.0 vhost, but the problem is persiting on a brand-shiny new ESXi vhost.

I'm currently doing a hand build & test to hopefully figure out what's wrong.
remarks: Condor doesn't handle the hostname not being an FQDN well at all. Fixed the hostname on the solaris machines to work around this.
